subject: JUnit in Pictures
msgSnippet: A little while ago I wrote a tool that shows the internal dependency structure of classes. I ve put up some shots of the framework package from junit 4.1 here:
messageBody:
A little while ago I wrote a tool that shows the internal dependency
structure of classes.

I've put up some shots of the framework package from junit 4.1 here:
http://michaelfeathers.com/junitpictures.html

I think there's a lot to see from this sort of view. You can see some
natural encapsulation in TestResult, for example. Nearly every piece of
data is accessed internally via methods.


Michael Feathers
www.objectmentor.com
